cccn.cfn.tools 0.0.0.9000

    • Mass Spectrometry Pre-Processing Guide

    Generate and Construct All PTMs Network

    GenerateAndConstructptmsNetwork.Rd

    This function generates and constructs the PTMs network from given data lists and tables.

    GenerateAndConstructptmsNetwork(ptmtable, keeplength = 2, output_dir = "plots")

    Arguments

    ptmtable

    A data frame containing all PTMs data.

    keeplength

    An integer specifying the minimum length of common elements to keep. Default is 2.

    output_dir

    A string specifying the output directory for saving plots. Default is "plots".

    Value

    A list containing the updated ptmtable and data for eu.sp.sed.ptms.

    Examples

    GenerateAndConstructptmsNetwork(ptmtable)
#> Connectivity of distance matrix with threshold dissimilarity 3.5 
#> Data are disconnected: 6 groups
#> Groups sizes
#>  1  2  3  4  5  6 
#> 32 10 35 15  7  1 
#> threshold dissimilarity 3.5 
#>  6  groups 
#> species scores not available
